recipesJson.name: Yeti's Yogurt
recipesJson.author: MattyWill
recipesJson.description: This recipe is simple yet spectacularly delicious. Sweet juicy berries picked from the forest with a dollop of yogurt. I could picture this being Bigfoot's all day snack.

reviews.text:
On the inhale i get a very very slight taste of vomit from what i think is the 5% creamy yogurt , it then turns into a very nice fruity creamy yogurt taste on the exhale. The more i vaped this the more the vomit taste went away which is a bit crazy, lol now i know what there on about on diy or die Noted with this odd taste from some flavorings.
Well worth a try if your thinking of mixing this ,who knows it might just be my taste buds. Good mix.
